TRANSMISSION of the interview to @MashiRafael with the Argentinean media, @ C5N by https://t.co/hPDG7zOe5H | # RafaelEnC5N
FACEBOOK LIVE ➡ https://t.co/6KhhHDnE5a Transmission of the interview to @MashiRafael with the medium @ C5N https://t.co/pKuRJiPnkJ
"The union of an entire people that never wants to return to the past" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Despite being a tremendously difficult time, despite the media framig, the Ecuadorian people won" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
We had a proposal, we had a legacy and the Ecuadorian people won "@MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"We would not have won the elections if the people did not believe in what we say and fulfill" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"A statesman was needed to see a whole, not just a part as business logic" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"The leadership of a country must be in the hands of politicians with responsibility and democratic legitimacy" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"The logic of a statesman is completely different to the business logic" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"For us, Revolution is not violence but a radical, deep and rapid change of the existing structures" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"The victories of progressive governments were impressive during these last years" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Historical processes also have setbacks but never return to the original starting point" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Despite the conservative onslaught of the Right, Ecuador cut that in the last elections" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Despite the transparency of the election process in Ecuador, the Right did not want to accept defeat" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Although actors from the Right prepared the 'fraud' show, they could not prove it and they were ridiculous" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"The # ParaísosFiscales are the most concrete sample of the supremacy of capital" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Who can justify a # ParaísoFiscal from the ethical point of view?" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"We all know that the # ParaísosFiscales are a source of corruption" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Through Popular Consultation it was rejected that public officials have accounts in # ParaísosFiscales" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"In Ecuador, public officials can not have operations in any # ParaísoFiscal" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
RT @mtt_chile: [ATTENTION] Along with the #Preemergencia decreed for tomorrow, Monday 22, the #EjesAmbientales begin to operate. Get informed and ...
"We had the right to make two key reforms: #LOC and Judicial Reform" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"It is not technical but political, the power relations changed, in Ecuador the Ecuadorian people are in charge" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"We are transforming from a bourgeois state that represented a few, to a truly popular state" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Technical decisions were made, for example to renegotiate foreign debt and oil contracts" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"Several decisions generate systemic competitiveness and social development" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"By being efficient and redistributing wealth in the best way, a historic reduction of poverty has been achieved" # RafaelEnC5N
"We all understand the importance of integration" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"A well understood integration favors us all, it is something fundamental in the governments of Latin America" ​​@MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"2/2 But who understands that society must dominate the market and not the market to society" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"1/2 What defines us as people of the Left is that we will always be the human being over the capital" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
"We are a Modern Left, where we look for non-market societies, but companies with markets" @MashiRafael # RafaelEnC5N
